name: CanvasRenderingContext2D.globalCompositeOperation
description: The CanvasRenderingContext2D.globalCompositeOperation property of the Canvas 2D API sets the type of compositing operation to apply when drawing new shapes.

refs.name: HTML Living Standard
refs.description: The definition of 'CanvasRenderingContext2D.globalCompositeOperation' in the 'HTML Living Standard' specification.
